about.intro: Hi, I’m Melek ElMokhtar, a Full-Stack Web Developer passionate about turning complex ideas into elegant, user-friendly applications.
about.paragraph1: With a background in Next.js, React, Node.js, and modern databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Prisma), I enjoy building solutions that are not only scalable but also deliver real business impact.
about.paragraph2: I thrive at the intersection of frontend precision and backend performance. Whether it’s designing a responsive interface, implementing real-time dashboards, or developing secure APIs, I bring a full-stack approach that connects the dots between user experience and technical reliability.
about.paragraph3: My recent projects range from delivering a collaborative documentation portal (MVP in 12 weeks, Scrum) to creating an e-commerce platform with secure payments and stock management.
about.list1: Strong command of JavaScript/TypeScript, Next.js, React, Node.js, Express
about.list2: Expertise in database design & cloud integration (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Firebase, Azure)
about.list3: Experience delivering end-to-end solutions, from UX to deployment
about.list4: A collaborative spirit, adaptability, and problem-solving under tight deadlines
